title: Enhancing Programming Practice Competencies: Teacher-Led Approach for Strengthening School Organizational Learning Capabilities

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: One can explain the four core elements (feedback system, professional learning community, continuous development system, evolutionary operational structure) that constitute the school organizational learning model.
Design an institutional innovation scenario applying a teacher-led approach in three stages (problem diagnosis—strategy formulation—implementation plan).

Learners can collect feedback from at least three peer learners using mobile collaboration tools (Figma, Notion, Slack), and write an organizational learning improvement project report (5 pages) reflecting the feedback. The report must meet at least two of the three evaluation criteria: clarity, feasibility, and collaboration effectiveness.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
